name: Slimekiller XMAS!
description:
DESCRIPTION
Slimekiller is a basic turn-based game with roguelike elements. Control the greatest killer of slimes and battle your way through a near infinite amount of procedurally generated levels and avoid death at all costs!

In this special XMAS release, kill the santa slimes to launch your playthrough into a temporary frozen chaos!

Enjoy!
